Angel Prime/Cheetor


he is put into in outpost at war right now. he looks around seeing 
everything is blown up or on fire. he starts walking searching for the one 
that will be the lost one. he saw two transformers fighting. a maximal and a 
predcon they were both were bleeding badlyl. one was the new cheetor. [beast 
machines cheetor.] he was not doing to well. Angel Prime was not sure which 
was the lost one. the predcon and or maximal. then both gave up the fight. 
they both fell down dying. the predcon died first. Angel Prime walked over 
to cheetor bending over looking down at him.



Angel Prime:



"so you must be Cheetor. I got a question for you. you can join me and 
search for the rest of the lost ones or you can go back to the beast wars. I 
am not going to let you die here so your choice?"


Cheetor:





"give me another shot at killing megatron. I will take it. just things must 
be new so ok."




Angel Prime throws a little ball on Cheetors chest and he starts to change 
into a TM3 body. his eys turn green he turns to his beast mode cause he can 
not yet control the new body. Cheetor then goes threw a portal. back on past 
earth thuder starts to form around the cf as three lighting bolts hit in the 
middle of what once was a battle field infront of the CF Cheetor walks threw 
the portal and looks around at all the new faces. then he yells out.



Cheetor:


"who is the leader around here?"




~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


Angel Prime then leaves the future and starts heading to the past to find 
someone of the lost ones. he has no control of where he is going. but 
whatever caused him to be able to do is not ready to stop.
